name: fishi wants revenge
description:
this is "fishi's revenge"

back story/lore

he was recruited by Mr beast the save the sea

objective

he's objective is to shoot down the garbage coming down from above
if there are more than 9 garbage pisces on the bottom of see you'll lose

for each garbage you destroy you'll earn some money and if you press scape

or the "pause button" you can buy upgrades with that money

controls

fishi will always follow you mouse

hold right click to speed up

hold left click to shoot
